exercises.name: Blink Speed Race Exercise
exercises.explanation: Blink as fast as you can and then relax your eyes. Ready, set, go!
exercises.benefit: Helps keep eyes moist and reduce dryness

exercises.name: Eye Strain Relief Massage Exercise
exercises.explanation: Gently massage around your eyes in circular motions to relax them.
exercises.benefit: Relieves tension and soothes tired eyes

exercises.name: Focus Training Game
exercises.explanation: Follow the bouncing ball with your eyes only, no head movement!
exercises.benefit: Improves focus and eye muscle control
